Download the Menu 
All Day Sandwiches

The Standard

A timeless breakfast staple: your choice of bagel, fluffy eggs or egg whites, melted Cooper Sharp, smoked bacon, turkey bacon, or pork roll

The Classic

Classic for a reason: your choice of bagel, smoked Nova Salmon or whitefish salad, cream cheese, fresh tomato and onion, and capers

Frittata Scramble

A savory-sweet twist on a breakfast classic. Your favorite bagel, loaded with fluffy eggs, cheddar, thick smoked bacon, fresh tomato, and our own strawberry jam

Egg White

Light and satisfying: your choice of bagel with fluffy egg whites, Swiss cheese, spinach, fresh tomato, and crisp turkey bacon

Nova Scramble

For lox lovers: your choice of bagel, fluffy eggs, smoked salmon spread, fresh tomato, and onion

Carnegie Breakfast

The real deal. Your choice of bagel, authentic Carnegie Deli pastrami, fluffy eggs, and melted Swiss cheese

The Cure

There when you need it. Your choice of bagel, brisket, smoked bacon, and jalapeÃ±o cream cheese

The Carnegie Reuben

A throwback done right. Your choice of bagel, real Carnegie Deli pastrami, melted Swiss, sauerkraut, and Russian dressing

The Philly Special

Our hometown hero. Your choice of bagel, brisket, seared red onion, spinach, and melted Cooper Sharpâ€¨*Substitute Chicken for Brisket

Avocado Toast

A fresh, modern must-have. Your choice of bagel (open-faced), smashed ripe avocado, cherry tomatoes, chili flakes, and a squeeze of lime

The Club

You want in? Roasted chicken, cheddar, smoked bacon, crisp Granny Smith apple, and honey mustard mayo

The BLT

A classic reinvented: your choice of bagel, crispy smoked bacon, fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy garlic mayo

The Garden Veggie

A fresh delight. Your choice of bagel, veggie cream cheese, crisp cucumber, slides tomato, and baby spinach

Za'atar Chicken Salad Sandwich

Herby and vibrant. Your choice of bagel, zaâ€™atar chicken salad, golden raisins, crisp lettuce, and tangy pickled red onion

Inside-Out Grilled Cheese

Melty perfection. Your choice of bagel, sliced tomato, smoked bacon, Swiss and Cooper Sharpâ€¨*No additions

Wood Oven Tuna Melt

Warm and comforting. Your choice of bagel (open-faced), our house-made tuna salad, and melted Swiss

Roasted Pizza Bagels

Two of the all-time greats. Your choice of bagel (open-faced), marinara, melted mozzarella, and a dash of oregano

Add Ons

Tomato, red onion, cucumber, lettuce, spinach, capers, avocado, apple slices, smoked bacon, turkey bacon, sausage, pork roll, Cooper Sharp, cheddar, Swiss

On Rotation at Spread: Dog Days Are Over Florence + The Machine // On Rotation at Spread: Bon Iver, St. Vincent "Roslyn" // On Rotation at Spread: Uncle Johnâ€™s Band Grateful Dead // 
Spread the Southern Charm

Our brand new Spread location is a taste of Montreal bagels in the South, by way of Philly. With charming outdoor seating in a corner location, our Mt. Pleasant Spread offers a sunny patio experience, or a cozy interior option for those who like to be closer to the fire burning in the oven.

Mt. Pleasant Favorites

The Standard

A timeless classic: Your choice of bagel, fluffy eggs, thick-cut smoked bacon, and melted Cooper Sharp.
Start Your Order 
BYO Breakfast Sandwich

You tell us exactly how you like it. Choose a wood-fired bagel, and add fluffy eggs, cheese, and any other fresh toppings you want.
Start Your Order 
The Classic

So good every time. Your choice of bagel, smoked nova salmon or whitefish salad, cream cheese, fresh tomato and onion, and capers.
Start Your Order 
Breakfast Starts Here.
Order Now SPREAD RITUALS 
Itâ€™s my favorite Saturday morning ritual to walk to Spread with our baby and pup!

Sam,

Local at Mt. Pleasant

Bagel after yoga workout class in the morning! I also grab bagels for work breakfasts.

Emma,

Local at Mt. Pleasant

In the Neighborhood

Located in the heart of Mt. Pleasant, Oyster Park is home to luxury apartments, southern dining staples, and wellness centers for the whole community to enjoy. Itâ€™s no wonder this city is top-ranked on travel lists every year, and Spread is excited to call it home.
favorite local spots
